Client
public interface ClientRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote

Method Summary
 boolean receive(Message msg)
          Depending of the nature of the client the message is printed on the console or displayed on the gui of the client.
 

Method Detail

receive

boolean receive(Message msg)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Depending of the nature of the client the message is printed on the console or displayed on the gui of the client. This method is used by the server to send a message to a remote client-object.

Parameters:
msg -
Returns:
true if the message was received and displayed successfully
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
